item.title: The Ethereum Hard Fork & Ethereum Classic
item.description:
The Ethereum Hard Fork & Ethereum Classic

The Ethereum Hard-Fork went as smoothly as possible. The event took place at Jul-20-2016 01:20:40 PM UTC and it was received quite well by the community, according to the price charts. Ethereum kept rising hours before the Hard-Fork and it kept on doing so after.

item.title: How To Buy Bitcoin & Ethereum Quickly: VIDEO
item.description:
How To Buy Bitcoin & Ethereum Quickly: VIDEO

The volume of questions I receive from readers and viewers about how to buy Bitcoin, and how to acquire secondplace cryptocurrency Ether, has definitely picked up in recent weeks. The public is interested in crypto again - maybe it was the recent block halving, or maybe it's the summer weather finally loosening pursestrings...

item.title: The Mr. Robot Hack Report: Bitcoin burglary and self-destructing hardware
item.description:
The Mr. Robot Hack Report: Bitcoin burglary and self-destructing hardware

Mr. Robot is a show built on hacks. The mother of all hacks serves as the big cliffhanger at the end of the show's first season, and nearly every plot development leading up to it was nudged along by some kind of exploit.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Analysis - The next catalyst is imminent
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Analysis - The next catalyst is imminent

The technical setups posted below use simple trend detection, support and resistance, channels, pattern and candle analysis. We aim for high-probability trade setups on BTCUSD and use very few indicators. All charts use BNC's Bitcoin Liquid Index for maximum accuracy. The timeframe for trades is 1 to 7 days, so we'll use 4h candlesticks.

item.title: Do you think Ethereum could ever reach the same price as Bitcoin?
item.description:
Do you think Ethereum could ever reach the same price as Bitcoin?

3 people want answers to this question. Be the first to answer.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/21/2016 - Bears Gaining Control! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/21/2016 - Bears Gaining Control! - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price made a downside break from its ascending channel pattern, signaling that a reversal is about to take place. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price made a downside break from its ascending channel pattern, signaling that a reversal is about to take place.

item.title: Is BigchainDB a promising feasible blockchain solution?
item.description:
Is BigchainDB a promising feasible blockchain solution?

I am doing research on available blockchain implementations. I came across the bigchaindb/bigchaindb project that follows an approach of building a blockchain by using a wrapper on top of a distributed database. Is this is really a blockchain and what are the pros and drawbacks of such an approach?

item.title: JPMorgan Chase urges asset managers to adopt blockchain
item.description:
JPMorgan Chase urges asset managers to adopt blockchain

JPMorgan Chase & Co, and an international management consulting firm, Oliver Wyman, recently released a guide encouraging blockchain technology adoption amongst asset managers: "The report is designed to serve as a guide to how the technology may evolve, the impact it may have on asset managers and the action they can take."

item.title: In less than 1 month ethereum conceived, proposed and implemented a hard fork. I love bitcoin but the stranglehold against any hard fork makes the system weaker, not stronger. * /r/btc
item.description:
In less than 1 month ethereum conceived, proposed and implemented a hard fork. I love bitcoin but the stranglehold against any hard fork makes the system weaker, not stronger. * /r/btc

Yes I'm referring to the block size debacle, but also in general to the mentality that hard forks should be avoided at all costs. Satoshi made...

item.title: Machines that learn will decimate human jobs ... or will they?
item.description:
Machines that learn will decimate human jobs ... or will they?

I was having a debate yesterday where a bank executive was asking me about what the hottest things in FinTech are right now. My answer was machine learning (AI) and blockchain. There are others such as contextual commerce, voice recognition and digital assistants, but machine learning and blockchain are top of mind.
